name: Bartok (FloyDnt)
description:
• The player's task is to get rid of all the cards in his hand. In the center is a card, if the player's turn, then he has the opportunity to put on top of this card either a card of the same suit, or the same card, but of a different suit. If the player does not have a suitable card, he takes a card from the deck and skips the turn. The first person to get rid of all their cards wins.
  • The game is controlled by the gaming mouse.

The source code of the project can be viewed here: https://github.com/FloyDnt/Bartok

Create by FloyD (Nikita Terlyukevich).
